name: plack-twiggy-pwa
description: A Plack Application as PWA running on a Twiggy Web Server

scripts.build: mkdir -p ~/bin && curl -L https://cpanmin.us/ -o ~/bin/cpanm && chmod +x ~/bin/cpanm && cpanm --local-lib=~/perl5 local::lib && eval $(perl -Mlocal::lib -I ~/perl5/lib/perl5/) && cpanm -vn --installdeps .
scripts.start: mkdir -p ~/bin && curl -L https://cpanmin.us/ -o ~/bin/cpanm && chmod +x ~/bin/cpanm && cpanm --local-lib=~/perl5 local::lib && eval $(perl -Mlocal::lib -I ~/perl5/lib/perl5/) && cpanm -vn --installdeps . ; plackup --server Twiggy --port 3000 scripts/web.psgi
